Bernie Sanders said should be paramount as Congress wrestles cutting the federal deficit. The people of this country want to make sure that when they spend a dollar on defense, it's going for defense, it's not going to companies committing fraud, said Sen. Bernie Sanders . Billions of dollars continued to flow to contractors even after they were found to have committed fraud, and about a dozen had been barred from contracting altogether.
